text: Popped In Souled Out is the debut studio album by Scottish band Wet Wet Wet. It was released on 21 September 1987. Its offspring singles were "Wishing I Was Lucky", "Sweet Little Mystery", "Angel Eyes (Home and Away)" and "Temptation". Upon release, it reached number two on the UK Albums Chart, held off top spot by Michael Jackson's Bad. It reached number one on 16 January 1988. A 5-CD 30th Anniversary Edition was released on 22 September 2017.Official Charts Company : ALL THE No.1 ALBUMS ==Track listing== ==Credits and personnel== Vocals by Wet Wet Wet and Graeme Duffin. *Marti Pellow – Vocals *Graeme Clark – Bass *Neil Mitchell – Synthesizers *Tommy Cunningham – Drums *Graeme Duffin – Guitar ==References== Category:1987 debut albums Category:Wet Wet Wet albums Category:Uni Records albums
title: Popped In Souled Out
